Issue.creator: eacoeytaux
Issue.summary: Updating assets acting differently in playground versus in network
Issue.description: {color:#333333}As the simple example attached in {color}{color:#333333}test{color}{color:#333333}.bna shows, when one tries to update an asset registry from a promise callback returned from a different asset registry, the original asset registry will not update, although there is no error thrown.Â This only happens in playground, whereas when the same code is run in a deployed network the code runs correctly.{color}
